name: Bishi and the Alien Slime Invasion!
description: Bishi jumps and boomerang attacks his way through three worlds to stop the Alien Slime Invasion, and stop the appropriately named Doctor Evilworth!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or above Processor: 1 GHZ or higher Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 122 MB available space
